name: 17-heroku-mongo-gallery
description: ``` npm init  npm install express ejs morgan body-parser --save npm install express-generator  --global                 //no need to be in production express --view=ejs                                      // generate the express skeleton app ``` If package.json have dependencies ``` npm install  // for updates DEBUG=17-heroku-mongo-gallery:* npm start npm start                                               //etc.  IF RETURNING THIS WILL START in this directory
